name: Rusty Roguelike
description:
Roguelike written in Rust Controls
  • Arrows or Numpad or HJKL YUNB
  • (g)et item
  • (i)nventory (use/wear item)
  • (d)rop item (from inventory)
  • (r)emove equipped item
  • (space or 5) wait a turn
  • (.) go downstairs

+ Mouse for item identification and Scrolls aiming
